alert.note: Alert for Appling; Tattnall; Toombs; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 9:01PM EST until further notice by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Altamaha River At Baxley affecting Toombs, Wayne, Appling and Tattnall Counties. Altamaha River At Charlotteville affecting Jeff Davis, Toombs and Montgomery Counties. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. The next statement will be issued Tuesday evening at 915 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Altamaha River at Baxley. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 74.5 feet, Flooding of agricultural and timber lands is expected. Deens Landing and Linton Carter Landing boat ramps, picnic areas and parking lots begin to flood. At 78.0 feet, Deens Landing and Carter Linton Landing are completely flooded. Davis Landing Road, Morris Landing Road and Getaway Lane at Carters Bight Landing begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 72.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Wednesday evening and continue rising to 77.6 feet Saturday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 74.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
